UI.Navigation: for navigation use: "←→↑↓". And to select "Enter"
UI.NavigationBack: press "Escape" to return to main menu
UI.NavigationWorld:
press '►' for play
      press '≡' for rename
press 'Ս' for delete world
UI.NavigationModFolder: Press Enter to open mods folder
UI.Name: Name:

About.Game:
This game was made by the author 
of the YouTube channel named @bondscreators.
Development started at 05.19.2024.
Genre of this game is RPG. 
The main feature of this game is console graphics.
About.Control:
W - Walk Up
S - Walk Down
A - Walk Left
D - Walk Right
Left Shift - Run

← - Move Cursor Left
→ - Move Cursor Right
↑ - Move Cursor Up
↓ - Move Cursor Down

Space - Toggle Cursor
P - Pause

E - Interact
B - Build
V - Destroy
L - Pick up item
